name: Entropy Harvest
description:
How far can you take a simulation? Is there a limit to madness, to our curiosity? Find out how far you can go using the lost rogue code written by 4 ancient Devs.

Inspired by Vampire Survivors and 20 Minutes Till Dawn, Entropy Harvest allows you to harness the power of the 4 elemental modules: FIRE, WIND, EARTH and WATER. Harvest elemental energy from your enemies to gain their magical powers fueled by (computer) science!

Gameplay:

  • Shoot to start the Simulation
  • Walk around the environments paved with the 4 main elements
  • Fight the hoardes of enemies and pick up the code they drop to fuel your magical endeavours.
  • Once you have gotten enough fragments, select an elemental module to raise your power level
  • Survive...

Controlz:

  • WASD to walk around
  • Use mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot and select Elemental Module
  • Right click to Dash / Use ability

This game was created in a week for GameCraft! 2022 with the theme "Magic as Science". All bugs are features and part of the lore now.
